hero.title: Local Guide & Recommendations
hero.subtitle: ğŸ‘‹ Hello! We have carefully selected all these places that we visit regularly. This guide reflects our genuine favorites after 8 years of living in the region. We hope you'll find good recommendations, and if you ever discover others, don't hesitate to share them with us!
hero.address: 3 route de la crÃ©taudiÃ¨re, 49630 Loire Authion

guinguettes.title: Riverside CafÃ©s - Our Summer Recommendation â˜€ï¸
guinguettes.experience_title: ğŸŒ The Essential Loire Summer Experience
guinguettes.description: Guinguettes are riverside restaurants open only during the beautiful season (April to October). These establishments offer simple cuisine and drinks in an enchanting and very relaxing setting - perfect for enjoying nature and the Loire river view. Often featuring live music, it's the ideal place to savor a fresh rosÃ© at sunset.

caparica.description: You can walk in nature around the island and visit the very beautiful small village and its church known for its summer pilgrimage.

barbe_maman.badge: ğŸ“ Our daily spot - The closest one
barbe_maman.description: Our daily spot! At Port Maillard, relaxed atmosphere by the Loire. Delicious mixed platters and excellent value for money. The perfect place for an impromptu aperitif.

port_thibault.description: Near downtown Angers with a magnificent view and a beautiful park for walking by the river. Ideal setting for lunch or an aperitif.

heron_carre.badge: ğŸ‰ The most lively in downtown Angers
heron_carre.description: The liveliest place in downtown Angers! Cool and relaxed atmosphere, excellent selection of draft beers. Perfect for an evening with friends in an urban setting by the Maine.

la_derive.description: Excellent concept at Port Saint-Maur! Specialized in local craft beers and quality products. Relaxed atmosphere by the Loire, perfect for discovering regional flavors.

guinguette_jojo.badge: ğŸ° The oldest and most famous in Anjou
guinguette_jojo.description: The oldest and most famous of the Anjou guinguettes! Exceptional setting on the banks of the Loire, Loire riverbank specialties, musical entertainment and panoramic view of the sunset.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.intro: We lived 4 years in downtown Angers and tested many restaurants. Here are our favorite spots. Don't forget to book as early as possible!
restaurants.angers_title: Restaurants in Angers (20 minutes by car)

bouillon_saint_laud.description: Welcoming brasserie with a varied menu at very reasonable prices and efficient, friendly service. Warm atmosphere opposite Saint-Laud station.

bistrot_des_ducs.description: After testing many restaurants in big cities around the world, "Des Duc" remains my favorite French bistro, for the quality, professional service and reasonable price.

kazumi.description: Not many Japanese restaurants in Angers, this one is the best. Only 12 seats and 1 chef. Daily menu decided by the chef, Japanese teppanyaki with French touch.

la_cantina.description: Cute little bistro, always full. Classic bistro food, good price. Great for a cozy evening or a tasty lunch break.

affames.description: French bistro with a modern touch, located in a cute Parisian-style square near the railway station. One of our favorite lunch places.

autour_cep.description: Traditional French food, tasty and generous, no fancy decor, just a place for food and wine. Good choice for dinner.

marie_milgoules.description: There are many crÃªperies in this area, this is our favorite. Located in a little lane opposite the Castle. Cute decor, no fuss classic menu, nice cider.

restaurant_sens.description: Great venue, fine dining, we believe they are aiming for the second Michelin star in Angers. Better try before they get the star and raise the price!

lait_thym_sel.description: Fine dining with one Michelin star, we liked it since they started, creative food always, but can be a bit over-priced now. If you are looking for something special, book early.

la_bafouille.description: You cannot find better view than this. Just enjoy a glass of rosÃ© and the best Loire view in front of you. Even parking in this little town 'La Pointe' is fun and beautiful.

route_du_sel.description: A must go place especially for summer. Stunning view of Loire, friendly environment. No over the top menu, I would recommend to order a nice bottle of wine and a simple plate.

douceurs_pilessis.description: A typical neighborhood restaurant owned by a French couple. Good value for lunch set, and the husband will try to speak English which is cute.

bellus_fortis.description: Another neighborhood restaurant, if you don't want to cook in our little kitchen, it's not a bad choice for a bite, like a typical French countryside bistro.

bars.title: Wine Bars in Angers
bars.intro: Discover our selection of exceptional wine bars in downtown Angers. Each with its unique character and specialty.

le_cercle_rouge.description: Our favorite wine bar! Specialized in Loire natural wines with producers like Mosse and Villemade. Unique atmosphere inspired by the film "Le Cercle Rouge" with bottles hanging from the ceiling. DJ and outdoor terrace.
le_cercle_rouge.address: 4 Rue des 2 Haies Â· Ralliement District

barco_vino.description: Unique experience! Floating wine bar on a barge facing Angers Castle. Over 300 references of organic and biodynamic wines. Panoramic view of the Maine and historical monuments. Mathilde (sommelier) will guide you.
barco_vino.address: Quai des Carmes Â· Barge on the Maine

le_1745.description: "The aperitif temple"! Unique concept: compose your own platter among 40+ French artisanal products. Exceptional charcuterie and aged cheeses. Perfect for an aperitif dinner in a friendly atmosphere.

trois_pinardiers.description: "Wine pirates" concept with nautical theme. Over 100 carefully selected wines, renewed monthly. 30min delivery service and educational tastings with maps and charts.

le_luluberlu.description: We love this place since the first day it opened. If you are looking for the best local cheeses and cold cuts, wines and a lovely owner, go there!

des_halles.description: Paris has 'Bon MarchÃ©', we have this classic gourmet shop in Angers. Great local products, much better prices.

biltoki.description: The trendy marketplace of Angers. Lively atmosphere with gourmet food and drinks. You can always find something you like, facing the Castle.

epicerie_premium.description: The best gourmet grocery to find the finest local specialties. Exceptional selection of regional and artisanal products.

maison_becam.description: Artisanal bakery recognized for the quality of its breads and pastries.

ptit_moulin.description: Traditional bakery with fresh daily products.

super_u_maze.description: The biggest supermarket nearby, you can find everything you need there.

carrefour_contact.description: Multiple locations in the region for your local shopping.

ferme_sainte_marthe.description: Seeds supplier and organic shop. Excellent selection of organic products with bread, seasonal and organic vegetables, essential fresh products, wine and beer cellar, numerous wellness products.

boucherie_royale.description: Local butcher offering quality meats and regional specialties.

activities.title: Activities by Season
activities.intro: Loire-Authion offers different experiences depending on the seasons. Discover our current recommendations and plan according to your stay period!
activities.current_description: This is the best time to enjoy riverside cafÃ©s, water activities and long evenings by the Loire. Temperatures are perfect for outdoor activities!
activities.summer: Summer - THE Season Not to Miss! ğŸŒ

terra_botanica.description: The first European park dedicated to the plant world.

velo_angers.description: Enjoy the bike paths and the Loire by Bike route that passes near us.

villages_fleurs.description: Discover the flowering villages of the region in spring.

summer_guinguettes.title: ğŸ· Riverside CafÃ©s - The Essential Experience
summer_guinguettes.description: **Our #1 recommendation**: The riverside cafÃ©s are open and offer the quintessence of Loire summer. RosÃ© at sunset, Loire view, relaxed atmosphere.
summer_guinguettes.recommendation: Tip: Book in late afternoon for sunset aperitif

summer_nautique.title: ğŸš£ Water Activities on Loire
summer_nautique.description: Kayak, canoe, stand-up paddle... Explore the Loire from the water! Several water sports centers nearby.

summer_velo.title: ğŸš´ Loire by Bike
summer_velo.description: Cycle the 900 km of bike paths along the Loire. Routes adapted to all levels, with numerous heritage stops.

summer_festivals.title: ğŸª Festivals & Events
summer_festivals.description: Summer is rich in festivals: music, theater, gastronomy. Check the cultural calendar of Angers and the region.

activities.summer_note: **It's now!** Summer is the magical period when the Loire comes alive. Enjoy the long sunny days and the Loire lifestyle.

autumn_vendanges.description: Participate in the harvest in Loire vineyards.

autumn_randonnees.description: Enjoy the autumn colors during forest hikes.

winter_marches_noel.description: Discover the Christmas markets of Angers and surroundings.

winter_degustations.description: Ideal season to visit cellars and taste Loire wines.

vineyards.title: Vineyards & Wine Cellars
vineyards.famous_wines_title: Famous Wines of the Loire Valley
vineyards.famous_wines_description: The region around Angers is renowned for its exceptional wines. Here are the appellations we recommend:

chateau_epire.description: Domain renowned for its dry white wines from SavenniÃ¨res, in an exceptional historical setting.

cave_robert_marcel.description: Traditional cellar specializing in Saumur sparkling wines, carved into the tufa.

caves_marson.description: Troglodyte caves offering guided tours and tastings in a unique setting.

domaine_giraudieres.description: Family wine estate offering organic wines and tastings in a friendly setting.

savennieres.title: SavenniÃ¨res
savennieres.description: Aromatic, elegant and mineral. Timeless and refined white wine to keep for at least 5 years. Three appellations: AOC SavenniÃ¨res, Roche aux Moines, CoulÃ©e de Serrant.

coteaux_layon.title: Coteaux du Layon
coteaux_layon.description: Largest sweet wine appellation of the Loire. Late harvest with noble rot, developing aromas of dried fruits, exotic fruits and citrus. Six villages can add their name.

quarts_chaume.title: Quarts de Chaume Grand Cru
quarts_chaume.description: Only Grand Cru of the Loire (2011). Golden and complex wines with notes of candied fruits and honey. Exceptional microterroir with noble rot, aging 20-25 years minimum.

saumur_champigny.title: Saumur-Champigny
saumur_champigny.description: Reference red wine of the Loire. Bright garnet color, red fruit aromas (raspberry, blackcurrant), violet floral notes. Light to medium body, lively acidity.

anjou_villages.title: Anjou Villages
anjou_villages.description: AOC created in 1991 for exceptional reds. Deep red color, black fruit aromas. Marked tannins, aging 5-6 years. Perfect with grilled meats served at 16Â°C.

bonnezeaux.title: Bonnezeaux
bonnezeaux.description: Historic sweet wine (1055), the lightest of sweet wines. Golden color with orange reflections, dried and white fruit aromas, floral notes. Indefinite aging.

cremant_loire.title: CrÃ©mant de Loire
cremant_loire.description: Traditional method, investment from major Champagne houses, promising future. White or rosÃ©, perfect for aperitif or festive toast. Superior quality guaranteed.

rose_anjou.title: RosÃ© d'Anjou
rose_anjou.description: Light rosÃ© wines to drink fresh under the pergola. Perfect accompaniment for charcuterie and composed salads. Summer freshness and conviviality.

vineyard_map.title: ğŸ—ºï¸ Vineyard Map & Winemaker Addresses
vineyard_map.description: Discover all the vineyards in the region and find the exact addresses of the producers
